title: Princess_Devi
author: Princess_Devi
content: Offline or Online it's ok. I just need to have some more fun that can be play to relax my mind. Don't like actions games like PUBG, APEX elegends

comments.author: sysoe
comments.body: You should check out Monument Valley 2. It's a sequel to the award-winning puzzle game Monument Valley. You have to guide a mother and her child through a world of impossible architecture and optical illusions. The game has stunning visuals, captivating music, and creative puzzles that will make you feel amazed.

comments.author: Princess_Devi
comments.body: Quote from: sysoe on July 31, 2023, 07:49:14 AMYou should check out Monument Valley 2. It's a sequel to the award-winning puzzle game Monument Valley. You have to guide a mother and her child through a world of impossible architecture and optical illusions. The game has stunning visuals, captivating music, and creative puzzles that will make you feel amazed.Thanks I will check that out, Is there anything that play online with teams?
